description: This file declares external API functions related to the HTTP 'Ato Status' object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions. It serves as a header file for the implementation of the 'HttpAtoStatus' component in a broader HTTP server or client project.

methods.name: HttpCreateAtoStatus
methods.description: Creates and returns a handle to a new HttpAtoStatus object, initialized with provided container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: HttpAtoStatusCreate
methods.description: Constructs a new instance of the HttpAtoStatus object, given container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: HttpAtoStatusRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified HttpAtoStatus object handle.

methods.name: HttpAtoStatusEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolle necessary internal objects for the HttpAtoStatus instance.

methods.name: HttpAtoStatusInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the HttpAtoStatus object after creation.
